subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: The New York Red Bulls squandered scoring chances and the Columbus Crew won its first M.L.S. Cup title on the keen passing of league most valuable player Guillermo Barros Schelotto.
snippet: The New York Red Bulls squandered scoring chances and the Columbus Crew won its first M.L.S. Cup title on the keen passing of league most valuable player Guillermo Barros Schelotto.
